attributes.action: Stop theft of vehicle affecting future price increase on new policies
attributes.additional_details: With insurance policies at all time high, why should we have to pay more money on insurance policies, following a theft of vehicle, especially when criminal has been brought to justice.

rejection.details: The insurance industry is regulated by the Financial Services Agency, which reports to H M Treasury; but it is not clear what action you wish the FSA (or any other part of Government) to take.
